name: Merge Memo - Color Tiles Tower
description:
This is a simple brain training game that will that puts your memory to the ultimate test.

You have to memorize all the tiles with the cat on it. It may look easy at the beginning but it gets harder and more challenging as the board starts to grow as you progress trough the levels.

Make shore to download it right now and start to power up your brains or even better, play against your friends. Enjoy!
